events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming wedding expenses.
The loan application was categorised under personal loans based on the stated purpose of the funds.
A loan officer has been assigned to manage the application and assist with the process.
The initial review of the application was completed to verify basic eligibility and documentation.
Additional documents including proof of income and identification were requested from the applicant.
Applicant provided all requested documentation promptly, including payslips and ID scans.
The credit check was completed, showing a satisfactory credit history for the loan amount requested.
Risk assessment indicated moderate risk but acceptable repayment capacity for the personal loan.
The loan offer with terms and interest rates was formally presented to the applicant.
The applicant provided positive feedback and accepted the terms outlined in the offer.
Following acceptance, the loan was officially approved by the credit committee.
The loan amount was successfully transferred to the applicant's bank account as agreed.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant is satisfied and note any additional support needed.
The personal loan application process was closed after successfully completing all required steps.
